extracted_information: Tauri provides comprehensive capabilities for implementing and customizing system trays in applications, offering both JavaScript and Rust APIs for seamless integration.

features.name: System Tray Creation
features.description: Allows creating and customizing a system tray icon for the application.
features.details: Offers customization options via TrayIconOptions (JS) and TrayIconBuilder (Rust).

features.name: Icon Management
features.description: Ability to change the tray icon, including using the default application icon.

features.name: Menu Attachment
features.description: Attach a context menu to the tray icon, displayed on click.
features.details: Supports adding menu items, and potentially submenus (referencing Window Menu documentation).

features.name: Menu Event Listening
features.description: Handle events when menu items within the tray's context menu are clicked.

features.name: Tray Icon Event Listening
features.description: Listen for various mouse events on the tray icon itself.
events: click (single left, right, middle click, with button state)
move (cursor moves around tray icon area)
features.details: TrayIconEvent (JS) and TrayIconEvent (Rust) provide event payload information.
